title: Tokoyami Towa 1st Solo Live - "Break Your xxx"
overview: Hololive 4th Generation's Tokoyami Towa first ever solo live concert! The Devil with a voice of an Angel debuts her first ever concert after going through many different experiences and making new friends throughout her VTuber career. Setting soon after the release of her first full-length album "Aster", this features many new her newest hits along with her classics including from her EP released in 2022 titled "Scream".  Held at the Tachikawa Stage Garden in Tachikiawa, Tokyo on October 13, 2023, and streamed online via Z-AN and SPWN.
